oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ramblin' Scotty & Smilin' Bill - Hi Neighbor radio show - 1941-10-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Ramblin' Scotty (Tommy Scott) and Smilin' Bill (Curly Sechler) perform on the 'Hi Neighbor' radio show, sponsored by Vim Herb. Recorded on 1941-09-29, broadcast on 1941-10-05 at 7:30am.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ramblin' Scotty & Smilin' Bill
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Opening statement -- Joy Bells In My Soul -- Some Glad Day Afterwhile -- Drifting Too Far From The Shore -- Give Me The Roses While I Live -- I've Got A Home In Beulah Land -- Closing statement -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WRDW (Radio station : Augusta, Ga.); Ramblin' Scotty & Smilin' Bill; Scott, Tommy, 1917-2013; Sechler, Curly, 1919-
